text: 13.35 Sng 118.26, Ais 1.7, Jer 22.5, Mai 3.12, Mat 21.9, Mak 11.9-10, Jon 12.13 Anɨb ak nɨgɨm agak. Kal nɨbi ak yokɨp yɨbɨl yenɨgab agak. Yad nɨbop agebin, yɨp kasek ma nɨgɨnɨgabɨm agak. Kɨdek agɨnɨgabɨm, Bɨ Bɨawl ne agyokek owup ak, Bɨawl ne bɨ anɨb ak nop gɨtep gɨnɨmuŋ agɨnɨgabɨm agak. Ñɨn anɨb ak nep yɨp nɨgɨnɨgabɨm agak.
